name: Pandora - New site player
description:
This is for the New Pandora Player. 
Currently only for Pandora One members but,
Eventually this will be the default site player.


Removed the footer area/links and made the background "Black"
no advertisements or google ad_words
tweaked the layout for Main Player and Bio page
additional_info:
v. 1.0 - Initial style created.
v. 1.1 - added backwards compatibility for the old site
         (since the new site is not permanent - these happily co-exist)
v. 1.2 - Pandora One right side panel fix (profile)
